name: Drew

Second Wind.description: Once per short rest, you can use a bonus action to regain 1d10 + your Fighter level in hit points.

ability_score_increase.description: One ability score of your choice increases by 2.

feat: One feat of your choice for which you qualify.

options: darkvision with a range of 60 feet
proficiency in one skill of your choice

equipment: A trophy from an animal you killed
